testCase.name: Character Stats Service getExperienceForLevel should return 0 for level 1
Character Stats Service getExperienceForLevel should return 100 for level 2
Character Stats Service getExperienceForLevel should return progressively more XP for higher levels
Character Stats Service shouldLevelUp should return false when experience is below threshold
Character Stats Service shouldLevelUp should return true when experience meets threshold
Character Stats Service shouldLevelUp should return true when experience exceeds threshold
Character Stats Service calculateLevel should return level 1 for 0 experience
Character Stats Service calculateLevel should return level 2 for 100 experience
Character Stats Service calculateLevel should return level 3 for 300 experience
Character Stats Service calculateLevel should handle experience in between levels
Character Stats Service applyExperience should add experience without level up
Character Stats Service applyExperience should trigger level up when threshold reached
Character Stats Service applyExperience should handle multiple level ups at once
Character Stats Service applyExperience should increase max health on level up
Character Stats Service applyExperience should heal to full on level up
Character Stats Service applyExperience should not heal if no level up
Character Stats Service applyGold should add gold correctly
Character Stats Service applyGold should subtract gold correctly
Character Stats Service applyGold should prevent negative gold
Character Stats Service applyGold should allow spending all gold
Quest Reward Calculations should apply easy difficulty multiplier
Quest Reward Calculations should apply hard difficulty multiplier
Quest Reward Calculations should apply streak bonus
Quest Reward Calculations should combine difficulty and streak multipliers
